text:
JMVJ-
BOARD of EDUCATION
OF THE CITY OF ATLANTA
ATLANTA 5, GEORGIA
Department of Audio-Visual Education
170 Tenth Street, N. E.
April 29, 1957
Dr. Harry J. Skomia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Skomia:
I have received a copy of a letter from Anna Hyer of DAVI
which indicates that your name was erroneously listed in our 1957
convention program as a participant. If this was an error, please
accept my apologies. Since you have had experience with engineering
national conventions, I am sure you understand how errors can creep
into the published program.
Wishing you and your association every possible success
with your splendid program, I am
Sincerely yours,
Walter S. Bell, Program Chairman
1957 DAVI Convention
WSB/bd
cc: Anna L. Hyer
ATLANTA THE DOGWOOD CITY
